mapper.select: SELECT SEQ_SP.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SPACE VALUES (#{spaceId}, #{spaceName}, #{spaceComment}, #{spaceDetail}, #{spaceTag}, #{spaceOption}, #{spaceAddress}, #{spaceNotice}, DEFAULT, #{spaceTime}, #{spaceMinPer}, #{spaceMaxPer}, #{spaceAdd}, #{spaceOpenTime}, #{spaceCloseTime}, #{hostId}, #{typeId}, #{statusId}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{spacePhone})
INSERT INTO SPACE_ATT VALUES (SEQ_SP_ATT.NEXTVAL, #{spaceAttOrigin}, #{spaceAttChange}, #{spaceAttChange}, DEFAULT, #{spaceAttType}, DEFAULT, #{spaceId})
mapper.update: UPDATE SPACE SET SPACE_ADD = #{spaceAdd}, SPACE_UPDATE = SYSDATE WHERE SPACE_ID = #{spaceId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SPACE S, HOST H, SPACE_ATT A WHERE S.HOST_ID = H.HOST_ID AND H.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND S.SPACE_ID = A.SPACE_ID AND A.SPACE_ATT_TYPE = '0'

SELECT S.*, (SELECT 'Y' FROM PRICE WHERE SPACE_ID = S.SPACE_ID AND ROWNUM = 1) PRICE_FLAG, (SELECT 'Y' FROM BOOK WHERE SPACE_ID = S.SPACE_ID AND STATUS_ID IN (100, 101, 103) AND ROWNUM = 1) BOOK_FLAG, A.SPACE_ATT_ORIGIN, A.SPACE_ATT_CHANGE FROM SPACE S, HOST H, SPACE_ATT A WHERE S.HOST_ID = H.HOST_ID AND H.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND S.SPACE_ID = A.SPACE_ID AND A.SPACE_ATT_TYPE = '0'

SELECT S.*, A.SPACE_ATT_ORIGIN, A.SPACE_ATT_CHANGE, T.TYPE_NAME FROM SPACE S, SPACE_ATT A, TYPE T WHERE S.SPACE_ID = #{spaceId} AND S.SPACE_ID = A.SPACE_ID AND S.TYPE_ID = T.TYPE_ID AND A.SPACE_ATT_TYPE = '0'
SELECT SPACE_ATT_ID, SPACE_ATT_ORIGIN, SPACE_ATT_CHANGE, SPACE_ID FROM SPACE_ATT WHERE SPACE_ID = #{spaceId} AND SPACE_ATT_TYPE = '1' ORDER BY SPACE_ATT_CHANGE

SELECT S.SPACE_OPEN_TIME, S.SPACE_CLOSE_TIME, S.SPACE_ADD, S.SPACE_ID, P.PRICE_ID, DECODE(P.PRICE_WEEKEND, '월', '1', '화', '2', '수', '3', '목', '4', '금', '5', '토', '6', '일', '7', '휴', '8', '') PRICE_WEEKEND,
P.PRICE_TIME FROM SPACE S LEFT JOIN PRICE P ON (S.SPACE_ID = P.SPACE_ID) WHERE S.SPACE_ID = #{spaceId}
SELECT * FROM TYPE ORDER BY TYPE_ID
SELECT * FROM "OPTION" ORDER BY OPTION_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE SPACE SET STATUS_ID = 1, SPACE_UPDATE = SYSDATE WHERE SPACE_ID = #{spaceId} AND STATUS_ID IN (0, 3)
UPDATE SPACE SET SPACE_OPER_STATUS = #{statusId}, SPACE_UPDATE = SYSDATE WHERE SPACE_ID = #{spaceId}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DAYOFF D, SPACE S WHERE D.SPACE_ID = S.SPACE_ID AND S.HOST_ID = #{hostId}
AND D.SPACE_ID = NVL(#{spaceId}, D.SPACE_ID)

SELECT D.*, S.SPACE_NAME FROM DAYOFF D, SPACE S WHERE D.SPACE_ID = S.SPACE_ID AND S.HOST_ID = #{hostId}
AND D.SPACE_ID = NVL(#{spaceId}, D.SPACE_ID) ORDER BY DAYOFF_START DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DAYOFF SELECT SEQ_D.NEXTVAL, DAYS, DAYS, #{spaceId} FROM (SELECT #{dayOffStart} + LEVEL - 1 DAYS FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL BETWEEN 1 AND #{dayOffEnd} - #{dayOffStart} + 1) I WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT NULL FROM DAYOFF D WHERE D.DAYOFF_START = I.DAYS AND D.SPACE_ID = #{spaceId}) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT NULL FROM BOOK B WHERE B.SPACE_ID = #{spaceId} AND B.BOOK_DATE = I.DAYS AND B.STATUS_ID IN (100, 101, 103))
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT #{dayOffStart} + LEVEL - 1 DAYS FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL BETWEEN 1 AND #{dayOffEnd} - #{dayOffStart} + 1) I WHERE EXISTS (SELECT NULL FROM BOOK B WHERE B.SPACE_ID = #{spaceId} AND B.BOOK_DATE = I.DAYS AND B.STATUS_ID IN (100, 101, 103))
SELECT * FROM "OPTION"
SELECT P.*, SPACE_ATT_CHANGE FROM SPACE P JOIN SPACE_ATT A ON(P.SPACE_ID=A.SPACE_ID) WHERE STATUS_ID=2 AND(SPACE_ATT_TYPE=0 AND SPACE_OPER_STATUS='Y' AND HOST_ID=#{hostId})
